english.segment2: You are the difference in us. You've broken the past. And set us apart. You caused the darkness to end. You lifted our heads. To know You again
english.segment4: Lord You bring us to life. In You our hope will arise
english.segment6: We are found. There's nothing that can hold us down. With anything against us. We know Your love will be the difference. Be the difference
english.segment8: You defied reason with love. Took the fall meant for us. You alone are enough. Though we were destined to fail. You opened the way. And broke every chain
english.segment10: Lord You bring us to life. In You our hope will arise
english.segment12: We are found. There's nothing that can hold us down. With anything against us. We know Your love will be the difference. Be the difference. You give and take. Still we will go Your way. All our fear is in the distance. We know Your love will be the difference. Be the difference
english.segment14: You awaken our hearts. To You we owe what we are. You're the change in us. The change in us. We know. You awaken our hearts. To You we owe what we are. You're the change in us. The change in us. We know
english.segment16: We are found. There's nothing that can hold us down. With anything against us. We know Your love will be the difference. Be the difference. You give and take. Still we will go Your way. All our fear is in the distance. We know Your love will be the difference. Be the difference
